remarks: Rule used to change the bound variable in a restricted universal quantifier with implicit substitution which also changes the quantifier domain.  Deduction form.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
cbvraldva2.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = y ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvraldva2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = y ) -> A = B ) $.
cbvraldva2 $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A ps <-> A. y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
